title: Gather Your Allies
content:
Your Allies Objectives

Recruit allies in the fight against the cult

Gather Your Allies Walkthrough

All possible allies:

Auntie Ethel: Kill Lora in quest Save Vanra. Veil of the Weird: Channel Auntie Ethel's magic to render 5 creatures within range Invisible. Volo the Bard: You need to save him in Goblin Camp in Act 1 and Lower City Baldur's Gate in Act 3 (next to the Steel Watcher factory) Passive: Volo's Guide to Monsters - +2 to all attack rolls, saving throws, and ability checks.
